text: The Smurfs 2 is a 2013 computer-animated comedy movie. It is the sequel to the 2011 movie The Smurfs. It stars Neil Patrick Harris, Katy Perry, Christina Ricci, and Jonathan Winters. This was the last movie by Jonathan Winters. It was released on July 31, 2013. title: The Smurfs 2
